name: HexWorld (itch)
description:
A HexWorld is part of my thesis about "3d game development with unity", and it's a procedurally generated advanture game.

Controls:

 -move : WASD , mouse
 -jump: space
 -camera rotate : Q, E
 - pause: esc

Enjoy the game, and don't forget to leave feedback for me, to make the game better, and to write my thesis about.

Thanks!
